title: "Prevent, rather than only report, serious AI incidents"
excerpt: "The new EU Artificial Intelligence Act (AI Act) should prevent, not just report, serious incidents. To help companies develop “safe and trustworthy AI applications”, the AI Act should require that “near-misses” are reported and addressed."
